This website is being hosted through [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com).
When people visit this GitHub Pages website, GitHub may gather personal
information about the users. This could include logs containing the IP addresses
of visitors. 

The purpose behind collecting this information is to meet legal requirements and
ensure the security and proper functioning of the website.

For more in-depth information, you can refer to the
[GitHub Privacy Statement](https://docs.github.com/en/site-policy/privacy-policies/github-privacy-statement).
